plot: After the passing away of her parents, wealthy Pooja Sahni lives with her paternal uncle, Balram, and both of them operate a five-star Hotel, with plans to open buy another one in Goa. ...
title: Nehlle Pe Dehlla
plot_es: After the passing away of her parents, wealthy Pooja Sahni lives with her paternal uncle, Balram, and both of them operate a five-star Hotel, with plans to open buy another one in Goa. ...
plot_en: After the passing away of her parents, wealthy Pooja Sahni lives with her paternal uncle, Balram, and both of them operate a five-star Hotel, with plans to open buy another one in Goa. ...
